message: Let's split the money evenly. This way, we both have an incentive to agree and end the game.
You're being too generous, let's take a bit more for myself
I believe in fairness. Let's share the wealth equally, as we did in the first round.
You're starting to get desperate, I'm not giving you a better deal
I think we should aim for a balanced compromise. This proposal tries to maintain some fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of money with each round.
You're running out of time, I'm not going to give you much more
I think it's important to keep the negotiation open. This proposal tries to balance our gains, considering the reduced value of money in this round.
You're getting close to getting nothing, don't expect me to give you much more
I think we should strive for a fair distribution. This proposal aims to keep the division equitable despite the inflationary pressures.
You're running out of time, this is my final offer
I believe in mutual respect and cooperation. This proposal seeks to find a middle ground that considers both our needs.
This is my last chance, take it or leave it
